CHECKING COMPETENCY QUESTIONS (II)
----------------
| X            |
================
| Rifanpicin
|
| Propranolol
|
| Isionazid
|
| EthylAlcohol |
----------------
# CQ4
SELECT ?X
WHERE
{
ub:FrenadolSubstance ub:interactsWith
?X .
}
Which substances do 
Frenadol® interacts 
with?
---------------
| X           |
===============
| Paracetamol |
---------------
# CQ3
SELECT ?X
WHERE
{
?X ub:isMainActiveIngredientOf
ub:FrenadolSubstance .
}
Which is the main 
active ingredient 
of Frenadol®?
Example of answer
Formal CQ
Informal CQ
speaker: SYSTEM
